text: Arrā koso wa, 7-sō no ten to dōyō ni (7-sō no) daichi o, sōzō nasa reta katadearu. (Arrā no) o meirei wa sorera no ma kara kudatte kuru. Sorede, hontōni arrā wa, subete no koto ni zen'nōdeari, mata arrā no o chishiki ga, subete no jibutsu o tashikani hōi nasa reru koto o, anata ni wakara seru tamedearu.
